lines.text: Enter MARK ANTONY and SCARUS, with their Army

lines.speaker: mark antony
lines.text: Their preparation is to-day by sea; We please them not by land.

lines.speaker: mark antony
lines.text: I would they'ld fight i' the fire or i' the air; We'ld fight there too. But this it is; our foot Upon the hills adjoining to the city Shall stay with us: order for sea is given; They have put forth the haven Where their appointment we may best discover, And look on their endeavour.
